Sit-Up.description: A sit-up is a strength training exercise which strengthens the hip flexors and abdominal muscles. It is performed by lying on the back with the knees bent and lifting the torso to a sitting position.

How to do.1: Place your hands firmly on the ground, directly under shoulders.
How to do.2: Flatten your back so your entire body is straight and slowly lower your body
How to do.3: Draw shoulder blades back and down, keeping elbows tucked close to your body
How to do.4: Exhale as you push back to the starting position.
